title: Redefines felony of assault in the second degree to include intent to cause physical injury where such injury occurs and results in further serious injury or death
summary: Redefines felony assault in the second degree to include intent to cause physical injury where such injury occurs and results in further serious injury or death.

       AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to redefining assault in  the
         second  degree  so as to include intent to cause physical injury where
         such injury results and in consequence of such injury further  serious
         injury or death occurs
